credit.name: betopia
credit.desc: coder, artist, composer, made 80% of everything
credit.speaker: betty
credit.line: here? so soon?
i thought i wouldn't see anyone here..
thanks for checking in and thanks for playing!
most of it might suck, and i'm sorry.. i just did most of the stuff alone..
but i got people who helped me in my journey and i'm glad i wasn't always alone..!
i wouldn't have gotten this out on my own.. i think..
well i hope you're enjoying the mod so far.. the others and i have worked on it hard.. mostly to get this out in time...
i nearly couldn't get it out due to electricity problems..
but that's probably tmi at this point. srry. lol
ok i'll go now.. bye..
you can still navigate this menu like normal btw. up and down to scroll thru members.. yknow.. alr i'll go now..
